sqlMap.select: select MAX(substr(entity_id,5,8)) entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER where entity_id LIKE #value#
select entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER where entity_name=#parentEntityName#
select university_id entity_id from UNIVERSITY where university_name=#parentEntityName#
select entity_type,level from UNIVERSITY_ENTITY_TYPE where entity_description=#entity_type# AND university_id=#university_id#
select entity_description entity_name from UNIVERSITY_ENTITY_TYPE where university_id=#university_id# order by level;
select entity_name from ENTITY_MASTER where university_id=#university_id# and level NOT IN ( select level from ENTITY_MASTER where university_id=#university_id# AND level >= #level#)
select entity_city from ENTITY_MASTER where university_id=#university_id# AND entity_type=#entity_type#

select e.entity_id entity_id,e.entity_name entity_name,e.entity_address entity_address, e.entity_city entity_city,e.entity_state entity_state,e.entity_phone entity_phone, e.fax fax,b.entity_name parent_entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER e, ENTITY_MASTER b where e.university_id=#university_id# AND e.entity_name LIKE #entity_name# AND e.parent_entity_id = b.entity_id AND e.entity_type=#entity_type#

select e.entity_id entity_id,e.entity_name entity_name,e.entity_address entity_address, e.entity_city entity_city,e.entity_state entity_state,e.entity_phone entity_phone, e.fax fax,b.entity_name parent_entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER e, ENTITY_MASTER b where e.university_id=#university_id# AND e.entity_city=#entity_city# AND e.parent_entity_id = b.entity_id AND e.entity_type=#entity_type#

select e.entity_id entity_id,e.entity_name entity_name,e.entity_address entity_address, e.entity_city entity_city,e.entity_state entity_state,e.entity_phone entity_phone, e.fax fax,university_name parent_entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER e, UNIVERSITY b where e.university_id=#university_id# AND e.entity_name LIKE #entity_name# AND e.parent_entity_id = b.university_id AND e.entity_type=#entity_type#

select e.entity_id entity_id,e.entity_name entity_name,e.entity_address entity_address, e.entity_city entity_city,e.entity_state entity_state,e.entity_phone entity_phone, e.fax fax,university_name parent_entity_id from ENTITY_MASTER e, UNIVERSITY b where e.university_id=#university_id# AND e.entity_city=#entity_city# AND e.parent_entity_id = b.university_id AND e.entity_type=#entity_type#
select entity_name from ENTITY_MASTER where entity_id=#entity_id#
select university_name entity_name from UNIVERSITY where university_id=#uni_id#
sqlMap.update: update ENTITY_MASTER set entity_name=#entity_name#, parent_entity_id=#parent_entity_id#, entity_address=#entity_address#, entity_city=#entity_city#, entity_state=#entity_state#, entity_phone=#entity_phone#, fax=#fax#, modification_time=#modification_time#,modifier_id=#modifier_id# where entity_id=#entity_id#
sqlMap.select: select entity_id,entity_name from ENTITY_MASTER where entity_type=#entity_type# AND university_id=#university_id#;
select distinct p.program_name from PROGRAM_OFFERED_BY pob,ENTITY_PROGRAM_MASTER p where pob.offeredby=#offeredby# and pob.program_id=p.program_id;
select distinct b.branch_name from PROGRAM_BRANCHES b,PROGRAM_OFFERED_BY pob where b.branch_code=pob.branch and pob.program_id=#program_id# and offeredby=#offeredby#;
